channel.title: mtgeldraine on Roy Tang
channel.description: Recent content in mtgeldraine on Roy Tang

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: I will admit I enjoyed the #MTGEldraine brawl on Arena. I may get into this format if it becomes regular, so that I have a palette cleanser for standard #mtg

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Not a fan of the templating “When <trigger condition>, do X, then do Y. Do Z.” The full stop after Y makes it like Z is a separate thing, since it’s no longer in the same sentence as the trigger condition. (Yes I know it doesn’t work that way.)

Quoted wizards_magic's tweet:

Tick Tock

Tick Tock

Tick Tock

It’s midnight here in Seattle, which means it’s time to move the countdown to SIX. #MTGEldraine
